mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDATA, t1.USERDATA2, t1.USERGROUPDETAILID, t1.USERGROUPDETAILNAME, t1.USERGROUPID, t11.USERGROUPNAME, t1.USEROBJECTID, t21.USEROBJECTNAME FROM T_SRFUSERGROUPDETAIL t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERGROUP t11 ON t1.USERGROUPID = t11.USERGROUPID LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSEROBJECT t21 ON t1.USEROBJECTID = t21.USEROBJECTID

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`USERDATA`, t1.`USERDATA2`, t1.`USERGROUPDETAILID`, t1.`USERGROUPDETAILNAME`, t1.`USERGROUPID`, t21.`USERGROUPNAME`, t1.`USEROBJECTID`, t11.`USEROBJECTNAME` FROM `T_SRFUSERGROUPDETAIL` t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSEROBJECT t11 ON t1.USEROBJECTID = t11.USEROBJECTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERGROUP t21 ON t1.USERGROUPID = t21.USERGROUPID

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDATA, t1.USERDATA2, t1.USERGROUPDETAILID, t1.USERGROUPDETAILNAME, t1.USERGROUPID, t21.USERGROUPNAME, t1.USEROBJECTID, t11.USEROBJECTNAME FROM T_SRFUSERGROUPDETAIL t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSEROBJECT t11 ON t1.USEROBJECTID = t11.USEROBJECTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERGROUP t21 ON t1.USERGROUPID = t21.USERGROUPID

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDATA, t1.USERDATA2, t1.USERGROUPDETAILID, t1.USERGROUPDETAILNAME, t1.USERGROUPID, t11.USERGROUPNAME, t1.USEROBJECTID, t21.USEROBJECTNAME FROM T_SRFUSERGROUPDETAIL t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERGROUP t11 ON t1.USERGROUPID = t11.USERGROUPID LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSEROBJECT t21 ON t1.USEROBJECTID = t21.USEROBJECTID

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.USERDATA, t1.USERDATA2, t1.USERGROUPDETAILID, t1.USERGROUPDETAILNAME, t1.USERGROUPID, t11.USERGROUPNAME, t1.USEROBJECTID, t21.USEROBJECTNAME FROM T_SRFUSERGROUPDETAIL t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERGROUP t11 ON t1.USERGROUPID = t11.USERGROUPID LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSEROBJECT t21 ON t1.USEROBJECTID = t21.USEROBJECTID

SELECT t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN], t1.[USERDATA], t1.[USERDATA2], t1.[USERGROUPDETAILID], t1.[USERGROUPDETAILNAME], t1.[USERGROUPID], t11.[USERGROUPNAME], t1.[USEROBJECTID], t21.[USEROBJECTNAME] FROM [T_SRFUSERGROUPDETAIL] t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSERGROUP t11 ON t1.USERGROUPID = t11.USERGROUPID LEFT JOIN T_SRFUSEROBJECT t21 ON t1.USEROBJECTID = t21.USEROBJECTID
